results.title: To Save Arcade?
results.description: Kitty and Colossus navigate one of Arcade's deadly traps.

results.title: Lifedeath:  From the Heart of Darkness
results.description: Storm solo adventure in Africa

results.title: The Spiral Path
results.description: Rachel Summers becomes Phoenix II; The Brotherhood becomes the government sanctioned Freedom Force; Freedom Force trounces the X-Men and arrests Magneto.

results.title: The Trial of Magneto
results.description: Cyclops and Storm return to the team; Fenris disrupts the Trial of Magneto; Maddie goes into labor; Xavier is injured and taken into space; Magneto joins the X-Men!

results.title: Duel
results.description: Cyclops and Storm duel for leadership of the X-Men; Cyclops leaves the team; Maddie's baby is Nathan Christopher Summers (later Cable); Xavier is stuck in space indefinitely.

results.title: X-Men, I've Gone To Kill the Beyonder
results.description: Rachel vs. the Beyonder Round 1.

results.title: Crossroads
results.description: Rachel vs. the Beyonder Round 2; Rachel steals all the life in the universe to confront the Beyonder, but then changes her mind.

results.title: What Happened To Nightcrawler?
results.description: Nightcrawler solo story.

results.title: Wounded Wolf
results.description: Lady Deathstrike cybers out at Spiral's Body Shoppe; Katie power is Christmas caroling when she finds a feral Wolverine being pursued by Lady Deathstrike and the Reavers.

results.title: Ghosts
results.description: Rachel is having nightmares about Wolverine killing her; Rachel goes after Selene, and Wolvie guts her before she can kill the Black Queen.

results.title: Retribution
results.description: The X-Men, Hellfire Club and Nimrod are all chasing down Phoenix.

results.title: Salvation
results.description: It's all out war between the X-Men and the Hellfire Club against Nimrod; Rachel Summers leaves with Spiral for the Body Shoppe (Next Appearance is Excalibur Special).

results.title: C'Mon, Mess With Us--Make Our Day!!
The Morning After
results.description: The Marauders begin their Mutant Massacre; Malice possesses Dazzler; Nightcrawler is beaten by a mob; Magneto is offered a seat in the Hellfire Club's Inner Circle.

results.title: Massacre
results.description: The Marauders cut a path of death through the Morlock tunnels as the X-Men try to stop them; Colossus kills.

results.title: The Last Run
results.description: Wolverine makes his way through Sabretooth to bring the Healer back to the mansion to tend the wounded; Nightcrawler, Kitty and Colossus are critically injured and taken out of action; The Morlock tunnels are purged.

results.title: Psylocke
results.description: Sabretooth invades the mansion and Wolvie and Psylocke have to stop him; Psylocke joins.

results.title: With Malice Toward All
results.description: The X-Men track down a Malice possessed Dazzler, and Malice jumps from member to member during the battle.

results.title: Old Soldiers
results.description: The wounded X-Men are ferried to Muir Isle for care; Longshot and Dazzler are members; Storm runs up against aging super powerd folk who are holding a young girl captive.

results.title: Crucible
results.description: Storm and Priscilla are on the run from a trio of super-powered fogies; Wolvie lends a hand.

results.title: Folly's Gambit
results.description: The fledgling X-Men team are on Muir Isle training with Banshee; Dazzler gets mad and storms into town where she runs up against the Juggernaut.

results.title: Charge of the Light Brigade
results.description: X-Men vs. Juggernaut; Havok and Polaris find a Brood Starshark that has fallen to earth.

results.title: Welcome to the X-Men, Havok--Hope You Survive!
Where Duty Lies
results.description: Havok rejoins the X-Men; Polaris is hunted down by the Marauders and possessed by Malice.

results.title: Unfinished Business
results.description: Storm hunts down Forge in a bid to get her powers back.

results.title: Death By Drowning
results.description: Rogue and Dazzler have it out; The Marauders go after Maddie and the X-Men intervene.

results.title: Heartbreak
results.description: It's an all out brawl between the X-Men and the Marauders.

results.title: Omens and Portents
results.description: Crimson Commando, Stonewall, and Super Sabre join Freedom Force; Havok and Maddie get closer.

results.title: The Dark Before the Dawn
results.description: Storm reaches Forge's Aerie and stabs him, learning too late that he was the hero and Naze the villain; Mystique warns the X-Men that Destiny has foretold that they will all soon die in Dallas.

results.title: False Dawn
results.description: Colossus returns to the team; The X-Men arrive in Dallas looking for Storm, and Freedom Force shows up to stop them from fulfilling Destiny's prophecy of death.

results.title: Go Tell the Spartans
results.description: The X-Men and Freedom Force team-up to try and save Dallas from the Adversary's chaos wave; Storm and Forge return to earth from the Adversary's world; Forge restores Storm's powers.

results.title: The Belly of the Beast
results.description: Forge must use the life force of the X-Men to banish the Adversary from Earth; Thus the X-Men die; But Roma brings 'em back.

results.title: Deadly Games
results.description: Flashback issue to a story where Wolverine, Dazzler, and O.Z. had to track down a Russian drug lord who was also a mutant.

results.title: Down Under
results.description: The Reavers bust up a bank in Singapore and try to make one of its officers one of thier own; The X-Men come to the rescue in the Australian outback and take over the Reaver's base as their new home; Roma shows up and makes the Reavers pass through the Siege Perilous.

results.title: T'was the Night
results.description: The X-Men return the Reaver's treasure trove of loot back to its rightful owners on Christmas Eve.

results.title: Dressed For Dinner
results.description: Gateway teleports Colossus to Limbo to help his sister (who thinks she conjured him up from the dead) save the New Mutants from S'ym and Baba Yaga.

results.title: Earthfall
results.description: The Brood lands on Earth and creates a band of super-powered humans to aid them in infecting the world; The X-Men see the situation a little differently.

results.title: Dawn of Blood
results.description: The X-Men battle the Brood through the city of Denver; Rogue, Wolverine, and Psylocke are captured; Maddie starts having serious hallucinations.

results.title: Glory Day
results.description: The X-Men take out the Brood; S'ym begins Maddie's transformation into the Goblin Queen.

results.title: Welcome To Genosha...A Green And Pleasant Land
results.description: Introduction to Genosha: An island off the coast of Africa where mutants are treated like slaves; After a pitched battle with the Magistrates, Wolvie, Psylocke and Maddie are captured and taken there.

results.title: Busting Loose
results.description: The X-Men desprately search for their captured teammate's whereabouts; Rogue and Wolvie have their powers stripped in Genosha; Rogue is raped by magistrates and lets Carol Danver's persona take over.

results.title: Who's Human?
results.description: Wolvie and Rogue learn the origin of Genosha; The X-Men arrive and begin the search for their missing comrades.

results.title: Gonna Be a Revolution
results.description: The X-Men launch an all out assault on Genosha; Wolvie and Rogue get their powers back; The Genegineer's son promises to bring social change to this country that enslaves mutants.

results.title: Vanities
results.description: Mr. Sinister muses on the death of the X-Men as he begins the plot that will release Inferno.

results.title: Inferno, Part the First: Strike the Match
results.description: Maddie and Havok have a date; Maddie contacts N'astirh and they arrive at Mr. Sinister's orphanage; New York starts to demon out; The X-Men track down the Marauders and pay them back for the Mutant Massacre.

results.title: Inferno: A Son For The Goblin Queen!
Inferno, Part the Second: Fan the Flame
results.description: The X-Men trounce the Marauders and start to act kind of demonic themselves; The Goblin Queen learns her origin--Maddie Pryor is a clone of Jean Grey created by Sinister.

results.title: Inferno Part the Third: Burn!
results.description: X-Men and X-Factor clash but then team-up against N'astirh, eventually defeating him.

results.title: Inferno, Part the Fourth: Ashes
results.description: The X-Men battle Mr. Sinister on the psychic plane; Maddie's mind merges with Jean Grey's; The X-Men hunt Sinister and the Marauders to his base of operations, Xavier's School for Gifted Youngsters; The X-Men attempt to separate Malice and Polaris but Sinister teleports them out and knocks them unconscious with only Longshot standing in the way of his victory.

results.title: Ladies' Night
results.description: The X-Women decide the best way to get over Inferno is to go shopping at the mall; Mall Security calls in the M Squad to catch a mall rat mutant who performs unauthorized light shows; Jubilee hitches a ride back through Gateway's teleport.

results.title: Men!
results.description: The X-Guys take off for Sydney to have a little fun and end up in the middle of an Alien Invasion where the ultimate weapon, The Jean Bomb--A red haired female shaped device that causes utter devastation and ruins all relationships, is about to be deployed.

results.title: The Day of Other Lights
results.description: Dazzler peers into the Siege Perilous and sees her doom; Nimrod and Mastermold merge; Rogue (in Ms. Marvel's costume) and Psylocke try to save Senator Kelly and his wife from Mastermold; Sharon Kelly gets blasted.
